answerText: The Cenci[10] This French playwright and theorist directed a notorious 1935 production of The Cenci, using it as an example of his concept of the "Theater of Cruelty", which he expounded upon in The Theatre and Its Double.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | NYU A + MSU + Caltech A | 10 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this play, Count Francesco toasts the news of the death of his sons in Salamance. For 10 points each: [10] Name this verse drama by Percy Bysshe Shelley, fictionalizing the murderous history of the title 16th century Italian family.
